summary_teim: The grand finale of the 1st annual induction ceremony featuring inductees and presenters performing "Gimme Some Lovin", "Matchbox Blues" and "Proud Mary".
summary_ssm: The grand finale of the 1st annual induction ceremony featuring inductees and presenters performing "Gimme Some Lovin", "Matchbox Blues" and "Proud Mary".
contents_teim: Julian Lennon, Neil Young, Billy Joel, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform Gimme some lovin -- Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform Matchbox blues -- Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform Proud mary -- Bill Graham thanks musicians -- Jann Wenner and Ahmet Ertegun say goodnight
contents_ssm: Julian Lennon, Neil Young, Billy Joel, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform Gimme some lovin -- Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform Matchbox blues -- Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform Proud mary -- Bill Graham thanks musicians -- Jann Wenner and Ahmet Ertegun say goodnight

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Julian Lennon, Neil Young, Billy Joel, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform "Gimme Some Lovin'" -- Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform "Matchbox Blues" -- Julian Lennon, Jerry Lee Lewis, Chuck Berry, Keith Richards, Sean Lennon, John Fogerty, Ron Wood, Steve Winwood, and Paul Shaffer perform "Proud Mary" -- Bill Graham thanks musicians -- Jan Wenner and Ahmet Ertegun say goodnight
name_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation
contributors_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation
